ticket.subject: Unresponsive application
ticket.description: Webpage is currently not responding, please fix ASAP
ticket.login_cmd: docker exec -i -t  $(docker ps  | grep enlargeyourskills/tk01 | head -n1 | awk '{ print $1 }') bash
ticket.extra_info: You can check if the webpage is respoding using http://localhost:8080 once the environment is started. There is a propietary webserver and an appserver
ticket.stop_cmd: docker stop $(docker ps  | grep enlargeyourskills/tk01 | head -n1 | awk '{ print $1 }'); docker rm $(docker ps  | grep enlargeyourskills/tk01 | head -n1 | awk '{ print $1 }')
